backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature update focused on modifying the ValentineEnvelopeScene envelope content block.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including components, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility layers plus custom OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with metadata and Google Fonts setup for Inter and Playfair Display.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that displays the envelope scene and a footer with attribution and copyright.
frontend/src/components/ValentineEnvelop: Manages the envelope, card, and message states with animations, floating hearts, sparkles, and transitions.
frontend/src/components/ValentineMessage: Message card view with typing animation, confetti, and navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor using the current Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, Valentine-themed OKLCH color variables, dark mode variants, and several custom animation keyframes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping App with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, typography, container settings, extended fonts, shadows, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata and notes, including a feature request to update the Valentine envelope overlay content.
